item.title: Air traffic controllers told to keep working during government shutdown
item.description: National Air Traffic Controllers Association tells its members that failing to report to work could cost them their job.

item.title: Ex-NFL quarterback Mark Sanchez charged with felony over violent altercation
item.description: Mark Sanchez was hospitalized with multiple stab wounds following a violent altercation over the weekend.
